Participated in a forum with Jennifer Hewitt and Former DPM John Anderson, 2017: Flights, accommodation, transport and meals for a member of staff to participate in the Joshua Berger Family Fellowship program, conducted jointly by the NSW Jewish Board of Deputies and the Executive Council of Australian Jewry Inc., 2017: Flights, accommodation, consumables and transport form Australia/Israel and Jewish Affairs Council through the Rambam Israel Fellowship program to attend the Coalition MP Study Group visit to Israel., 2017: Reimbursement of flight costs from Soldier On Australia in order to fundraiser and take part in Pollie Pedal, 2016: Complimentary Airport Parking from Perth Airport, 2016: Economy flights from Perth to Honolulu from the Australian American Leadership Dialogue to attend their Honolulu Dialogue
